2021680.name: Visual Novel Maker - NPC Male Villagers Vol.1
2021680.description:
Are you worried that your male NPCs are a bit too quiet? Do you want to add some extra liveliness while your players wander town maps? Then it’s time to give NPC Male Villagers Vol.1 a listen!

12 different types of male voices offer you a wide selection of short Japanese shouts, from cheerful young boys to energetic teens and even serious elders, perfect for giving your male villagers a voice no matter their age! Give your men some audio love with NPC Male Villagers Vol1!

Features:

* 120 different sayings
* ogg and m4a file formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
2021680.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
